revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The school of arts; or, An Introduction to Useful Knowledge, being a compilation of real Experiments and Improvements, in several pleasing Branches of Science... By..."
revision.text: Possibly: The school of arts; or, An Introduction to Useful Knowledge, being a compilation of real Experiments and Improvements, in several pleasing Branches of Science... By John Imison. 2nd ed. (London: printed for the author, and sold by J. Murray, Fleet-Street, [1790?]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2498350~S1
